title: Wo Jia Da Shixiong Naozi You Keng: Tebie Pian

synonyms: There's a Pit in My Senior Martial Brother's Brain Special, Our Big Brother's Mind Has A Problem Special
alternative_titles.en: What's Wrong with My Big Brother Special
alternative_titles.ja: 我家大师兄脑子有坑 特别篇

synopsis:
In the first and second seasons, Dongfang Xianyun and his friends had many untold stories about their lives, stories filled with blood and tears, which are truly heartbreaking to hear and tearful to see.

(Source: Bilibili, translated)
